verses.verse: <WG2532> I saw, <WG1492> in <WG1909> the right hand <WG1188> of him who sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne, <WG2362> a book <WG975> written <WG1125> inside <WG2081> and <WG2532> outside, <WG3693> sealed <WG2696> shut with seven <WG2033> seals. <WG4973>

<WG2532> I saw <WG1492> a mighty <WG2478> angel <WG32> proclaiming <WG2784> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> "Who <WG5101> is <WG2076> worthy <WG514> to open <WG455> the book, <WG975> and <WG2532> to break <WG3089> its <WG846> seals? <WG4973>"

<WG2532> No one <WG3762> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> above, <WG3761> or on <WG1909> the earth, <WG1093> or <WG3761> under <WG5270> the earth, <WG1093> was able <WG1410> to open <WG455> the book, <WG975> or <WG975> to look <WG991> in it. <WG846>

And <WG2532> I <WG1473> wept <WG2799> much, <WG4183> because <WG3754> no one <WG3762> was found <WG2147> worthy <WG514> to open <WG455> <WG2532> <WG314> the book, <WG975> or <WG3777> to look <WG991> in it. <WG846>

<WG2532> One <WG1520> of <WG1537> the elders <WG4245> said <WG3004> to me, <WG3427> "Don't <WG3361> weep. <WG2799> Behold, <WG2400> the Lion <WG3023> who is <WG5607> of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Judah, <WG2448> the Root <WG4491> of David, <WG1138> has overcome; <WG3528> he who opens <WG455> the book <WG975> and <WG2532> <WG99999> its <WG846> seven <WG2033> seals. <WG4973>"

<WG2532> I saw <WG1492> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the throne <WG2362> and <WG2532> of the four <WG5064> living creatures, <WG2226> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the elders, <WG4245> a Lamb <WG721> standing, <WG2476> as <WG5613> though it had been slain, <WG4969> having <WG2192> seven <WG2033> horns, <WG2768> and <WG2532> seven <WG2033> eyes, <WG3788> which <WG3739> are <WG1526> the seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> of God, <WG2316> sent out <WG649> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the earth. <WG1093>
Then <WG2532> he came, <WG2064> and <WG2532> he took <WG2983> it <WG975> out of <WG1537> the right hand <WG1188> of him who sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne. <WG2362>

Now <WG2532> when <WG3753> he had taken <WG2983> the book, <WG975> the four <WG5064> living creatures <WG2226> and <WG2532> the twenty <WG1501> - four <WG5064> elders <WG4245> fell down <WG4098> before <WG1799> the Lamb, <WG721> each <WG1538> one having <WG2192> a harp, <WG2788> and <WG2532> golden <WG5552> bowls <WG5357> full <WG1073> of incense, <WG2368> which <WG3739> are <WG1526> the prayers <WG4335> of the saints. <WG40>

<WG2532> They sang <WG103> a new <WG2537> song, <WG5603> saying, <WG3004> "You are <WG1488> worthy <WG514> to take <WG2983> the book, <WG975> and <WG2532> to open <WG455> its <WG846> seals: <WG4973> for <WG3754> you were killed, <WG4969> and <WG2532> bought <WG59> us <WG2248> for God <WG2316> with <WG1722> your <WG4675> blood, <WG129> out <WG1537> of every <WG3956> tribe, <WG5443> language, <WG1100> people, <WG2992> and <WG2532> nation, <WG1484>
and <WG2532> made <WG4160> us <WG2248> kings <WG935> and <WG2532> priests <WG2409> to our <WG2257> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> we will reign <WG936> on <WG1909> earth. <WG1093>"

<WG2532> I saw, <WG1492> and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> something like a voice <WG5456> of many <WG4183> angels <WG32> around <WG2943> the throne, <WG2362> <WG2532> the living creatures, <WG2226> and <WG2532> the elders; <WG4245> and <WG2532> the number <WG706> of them <WG846> was <WG2258> ten thousands <WG3461> of ten thousands, <WG3461> and <WG2532> thousands <WG5505> of thousands; <WG5505>

saying <WG3004> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> "Worthy <WG514> is <WG2076> the Lamb <WG721> who has been killed <WG4969> to receive <WG2983> the power, <WG1411> wealth, <WG4149> wisdom, <WG4678> strength, <WG2479> honor, <WG5092> glory, <WG1391> and <WG2532> blessing! <WG2129>"

<WG2532> I heard <WG191> every <WG3956> created thing <WG2938> which <WG3739> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> on <WG1722> the earth, <WG1093> <WG2532> under <WG5270> the earth, <WG1093> <WG2532> <WG3739> <WG99999> on <WG1909> the sea, <WG2281> and <WG2532> everything <WG3956> in <WG1909> them, <WG846> saying, <WG3004> "To him who sits <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne, <WG2362> and <WG2532> to the Lamb <WG721> be the blessing, <WG2129> <WG2532> the honor, <WG5092> <WG2532> the glory, <WG1391> and <WG2532> the dominion, <WG2904> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever! <WG165> Amen!"
<WG2532> The four <WG5064> living creatures <WG2226> said, <WG3004> "Amen! <WG281>" <WG2532> The elders <WG4245> fell down <WG4098> and <WG2532> worshiped. <WG4352>
